requirements.summary: Remove the /coloring route from the TanStack Router configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer defines a route with `path: '/coloring'`.
The app builds successfully with no unused-import or missing-module errors related to `ColoringPage`.

file_operations.description: Remove the `ColoringPage` import, remove the `coloringRoute` definition, and remove the `coloringRoute` entry from `routeTree` so `/coloring` is no longer registered.

requirements.summary: Remove the Coloring navigation link from both desktop and mobile menus.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx` has no nav link with `href: '/coloring'` and no label `Coloring`.
Desktop navigation no longer displays a “Coloring” button.
Mobile navigation sheet no longer displays a “Coloring” button.

file_operations.description: Delete the `/coloring` entry from the `navLinks` array so neither desktop nor mobile navigation renders a Coloring link.

requirements.summary: Delete the Coloring page implementation and ensure it is no longer referenced.
acceptanceCriteria: No TypeScript compile errors occur due to references to `ColoringPage`.
A project-wide search shows no remaining imports of `./pages/ColoringPage` and no remaining references to `ColoringPage`.

file_operations.description: Remove the Coloring page component file from the project.
Ensure all imports/references to `ColoringPage` are removed so deleting the file does not break the build.

requirements.summary: Remove Coloring-related static assets (PNG/PDF and associated files) from shipped frontend assets.
acceptanceCriteria: `/assets/coloring/icoloring-9sd9.png` is removed from the frontend static assets.
Any Coloring-related PDF/static assets previously added for Coloring are removed from the frontend static assets.
A project-wide search shows no remaining references to `/assets/coloring/` or `icoloring-9sd9.png`.

file_operations.description: Delete the Coloring preview PNG referenced by the removed Coloring feature.
Delete the Coloring-related PDF asset from the frontend static assets.
Delete the Coloring-related PDF asset from the frontend static assets.
Delete any duplicate/alternate location copy of the Coloring PNG from the frontend static assets, if present in this path.

requirements.summary: Remove any remaining user-facing Coloring references across the frontend UI and content.
acceptanceCriteria: A project-wide search for "Coloring" and "/coloring" finds no remaining user-facing labels/links/routes related to the removed feature.
No page displays headings, helper text, or calls-to-action related to Coloring after the change.

file_operations.description: Audit header/footer links and remove any remaining user-facing references to "Coloring" or "/coloring" if present (none expected based on current structure).
Audit homepage CTAs/feature cards and remove any remaining user-facing references to "Coloring" or "/coloring" if present.
